channel.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
channel.description:
I was a member and was botting on p owe rb ot. or gs bot and got banned i had a decsent account ive been banned for like a month or so
dose anyone know of anyone getting unbanned if so in how long
do you think i will get unbanned and if so when?
thankyou in advance

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

I found best method is to go to recover stolen password first. Then after wards try to unban it and make up some stupid story about how you been gone and stuff, and it was hacked.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help when will i get unbanned?

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @xEvo Exion
item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

[quote=“moparRuler, post:9, topic:368046”]I recovered an account I had not used for 4 years. Then I remembered why I stopped using it banned.

I managed to recover it and even also unban it, in the same day. It all depends what you say for the appeal. This is a 3rd account i manage to unban from a Permanent Ban[/quote]
Lucky. I don’t know why, but I was retarded and said I wasn’t on my account at the time.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help when will i get unbanned?

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @prison190 prison190
item.description:
@prison190 wrote:

[quote=“ERS, post:7, topic:368046”]iv been banned for botting but the server detected me not a mod so i got banned with no evidence and i sent an email saying there was an error(lol :P) and one of the mods unban me

sooo fucking happy btw im still botting loooooooooooool[/quote]

Funniest freaking story ive ever heard about runescape so far

Read full topic
item.source: Please help when will i get unbanned?

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @moparRuler moparRuler
item.description:
@moparRuler wrote:

I recovered an account I had not used for 4 years. Then I remembered why I stopped using it banned.

I managed to recover it and even also unban it, in the same day. It all depends what you say for the appeal. This is a 3rd account i manage to unban from a Permanent Ban

Read full topic
item.source: Please help when will i get unbanned?

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

There was a behind the scenes in 2009 that gave a warning if you macro/bot. And it said you will be perm banned, no warnings. So It’s highly likely you will stay banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Please help when will i get unbanned?

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @ERS ERS
item.description:
@ERS wrote:

iv been banned for botting but the server detected me not a mod so i got banned with no evidence and i sent an email saying there was an error(lol :P) and one of the mods unban me

sooo fucking happy btw im still botting loooooooooooool

Read full topic

I’ve been banned in April. Some people say it takes 2 year to get unbanned.

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

I’ve been banned for 13 months on a main.

It will take 3-4 years to finally get it back.

item.title: Please help when will i get unbanned?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

[quote=“Crown2, post:1, topic:368046”]I was a member and was botting on p owe rb ot. or gs bot and got banned i had a decsent account ive been banned for like a month or so

dose anyone know of anyone getting unbanned if so in how long

do you think i will get unbanned and if so when?

thankyou in advance[/quote]

My main has been banned for a year now, I doubt you will be un banned.

ps: Just make a new account.
